channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: What Song Plays During the End Credits of Superman?
item.description: 🎶 Did you know which song plays during Superman's end credits? Dive into this musical movie trivia! 🎬 #Superman #MovieMusicFacts

item.title: Total Wife Announce New Album Come Back Down: Hear “second spring”
item.description: 🌸 Total Wife is back with "second spring" vibes! 🎶 Dive into their new album "Come Back Down" now! 🌼 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Wet Leg Bring ‘Moisturizer’ to NPR Tiny Desk
item.description: Dive into the quirky world of Wet Leg with their groovy performance on NPR Tiny Desk! 🎶💦 #WetLeg #TinyDeskConcert

item.title: Rocket announce debut album & fall tour, share “Wide Awake”
item.description: 🚀 Blast off with Rocket's debut album & tour! 🎶 Get 'Wide Awake' and ready for an out-of-this-world experience! 🌟 #RocketMusic #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Jay Som Returns With Help From Hayley Williams, Jim Adkins
item.description: Jam out to Jay Som's epic comeback featuring Hayley Williams and Jim Adkins! 🎶🔥 #MusicCollabGoals
